statements: SELECT * FROM financial_news_sentiment_analysis;
SELECT news_title, sentiment_score FROM financial_news_sentiment_analysis WHERE publish_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM financial_news_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT news_id, news_title, publish_date FROM financial_news_sentiment_analysis ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM financial_news_sentiment_analysis;
SELECT news_title, sentiment_score FROM financial_news_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_news_sentiment_analysis WHERE news_title LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY news_id ASC;
SELECT news_id, news_title, publish_date FROM financial_news_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0 OR publish_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_news_sentiment_analysis WHERE news_content LIKE '%economy%' OR sentiment_score < -0.3 ORDER BY publish_date ASC;
SELECT news_id, news_title, sentiment_score, publish_date FROM financial_news_sentiment_analysis WHERE publish_date >= '2021-06-01' AND publish_date <= '2021-06-30' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_news;
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM financial_news WHERE news_id = 1;
SELECT news_title, publish_date FROM financial_news ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT news_title, sentiment_score FROM financial_news WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT analysis_date, sentiment_label, confidence_level FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT news_title, publish_date FROM financial_news WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM financial_news WHERE LENGTH(news_title) > 10 AND sentiment_score < 0 ORDER BY news_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_news JOIN sentiment_analysis ON financial_news.news_id = sentiment_analysis.news_id WHERE confidence_level > 0.7 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_sentimental_news FROM financial_news WHERE sentiment_score > 0.3;
SELECT average(sentiment_score) AS avg_score, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM financial_news;
SELECT * FROM financial_news;
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM financial_news WHERE publish_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT news_id, news_title, publish_date FROM financial_news ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM trading_models WHERE model_name LIKE '%prediction%';
SELECT * FROM financial_news ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM financial_news WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT news_title, news_content, sentiment_score FROM financial_news JOIN sentiment_analysis ON financial_news.news_id = sentiment_analysis.news_id;
SELECT * FROM trading_models WHERE model_name LIKE '%AI%' ORDER BY model_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_news;
SELECT news_title, publish_date FROM financial_news WHERE publish_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM financial_news WHERE news_id = 1;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM trading_models;
SELECT news_title, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM financial_news JOIN sentiment_analysis ON financial_news.news_id = sentiment_analysis.news_id;
SELECT news_title, publish_date FROM financial_news ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM financial_news WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM trading_models WHERE LENGTH(model_description) > 50;
SELECT news_title, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM financial_news JOIN sentiment_analysis ON financial_news.news_id = sentiment_analysis.news_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;

SELECT news_title, news_content, sentiment_category FROM financial_news JOIN sentiment_analysis ON financial_news.news_id = sentiment_analysis.news_id JOIN news_sentiment_mapping ON financial_news.news_id = news_sentiment_mapping.news_id WHERE news_sentiment_mapping.sentiment_id = 1 ORDER BY news_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM Financial_News;
SELECT news_title, publication_date FROM Financial_News WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT source_name, source_url FROM News_Sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_type, last_updated FROM Trading_Models WHERE model_type = 'AI';
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM Financial_News WHERE news_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM Financial_News WHERE publication_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT source_name, source_url FROM News_Sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_type, last_updated FROM Trading_Models WHERE model_type = 'Machine Learning' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT news_title, publication_date FROM Financial_News JOIN Model_Results ON Financial_News.news_id = Model_Results.news_id WHERE Model_Results.trade_decision = 'Buy' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;

SELECT news_title, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM Financial_News JOIN Sentiment_Analysis ON Financial_News.news_id = Sentiment_Analysis.news_id WHERE Sentiment_Analysis.sentiment_score > 0.75 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
